My Work Process

All of my work and projects are based off of a system to get the result that I am looking for.

1

Planning / Strategist

This is the preperation phase. Incuded planning strategy, analysis, web design and deploy & more.

2

Acquisition

Bringing new clients to your business. The goal of this process is to create a systematic, sustainable acquisition strategy.

3

Retention

Increasing the likelihood of a customer purchasing again, while focusing on increasing the profitability of each repeat purchase.

4

Conversion

Utilizing psychology, sales techniques, tatics to encourage customers to take specific conversion action.
